moreBlocks.articles:
• Personal Injury
    From the time our practice was established in 1987, the Maryland personal injury lawyers at LeViness, Tolzman & Hamilton have successfully obtained more than $100 million in settlements and verdicts for our clients.
  • Auto Accidents
    Since 1987, LeViness, Tolzman & Hamilton, P.A. has helped people injured in auto, trucking, motorcycle and pedestrian accidents.
  • Wrongful Death
    LeViness, Tolzman & Hamilton, P.A. was established in Baltimore 33 years ago to help families like yours who have been torn apart because of the negligence of another individual or corporation.
  • Workers' Compensation
    Hurt on the job? Call LeViness, Tolzman & Hamilton, P.A.. We have been representing injured employees with Workers’ Comp claims, including those with work-related accidental injuries and occupational diseases, throughout Maryland.
  • Bankruptcy
    LeViness, Tolzman & Hamilton, P.A. can give you the decisive edge when handling your bankruptcy case. Our experience, know-how, and resources will assist you with the process.

description:
LeViness, Tolzman & Hamilton, P.A.: Client Satisfaction Is Our No. 1 Priority

LeViness, Tolzman & Hamilton, P.A., is a Baltimore-based law firm serving clients throughout Maryland. Our team of attorneys and professional staff is committed to providing the highest-quality legal services in a wide variety of practice areas, including:

  • Auto accidents, including car, truck, motorcycle, pedestrian, bicyclist and other types of accidents
  • Plaintiff's personal injury, including slip-and-fall accidents and other premises liability claims
  • Medical malpractice
  • Boating accidents
  • Catastrophic injuries
  • Wrongful death
  • Nursing home negligence and abuse
  • Birth injuries
  • Social Security Disability (SSD)
  • Criminal defense
  • Bankruptcy

Since opening our doors in 1980, we have built upon years of experience and firsthand knowledge of our local communities. We understand the numerous legal challenges facing the individuals and families that turn to our firm. By taking a personal approach to working with clients, we build strong relationships that support our clients' needs and goals today, tomorrow and well into the future. Whether you and your family are dealing with injuries stemming from a serious car accident or have fallen on difficult financial times and need to explore your bankruptcy options, we will provide you with the information, resources and legal support to see you through.

A Team Built On A Foundation Of Success

In personal injury cases, we have recovered more than $100 million on behalf of our clients. Furthermore, our attorneys have been recognized by numerous professional organizations, including Super Lawyers magazine, listed among the Top 100 Trial Lawyers, as a Top Lawyer in Maryland, and as a 10 Best in Client Satisfaction by the American Institute of DUI/DWI Attorneys. Our bankruptcy attorney is a member of the National Association of Consumer Bankruptcy Attorneys (NACBA) and the National Organization of Social Security Claimants' Representatives (NOSSCR). Furthermore, our entire team is dedicated to giving back to our local communities through involvement in charitable efforts and organizations.

We Will Fight For You

There's no reason to face legal obstacles on your own. Contact LeViness, Tolzman & Hamilton, P.A., and schedule a free initial consultation at our Baltimore, Columbia, Glen Burnie or Towson law offices.
